data.title: Old Midnight Choir
data.meta_description: Abby attends a childhood friend's wedding. This event heightens the anticipatory grief she feels about losing her dad who is terminally sick.
data.text:
Mountain Culture Short

ELLADJ

“Elladj" is a short documentary following the remarkable journey of Elladj Balde, a Canadian figure skater who found his voice and fan base…

BC Student Shortwork Competition

Gerald

Aware that he will die after he mates, Gerald, a young Butterscotch Beetle, swears off love and romance for as long as possible.
